dcterms:creator: Giorgio Corani
Dario Azzimonti
João P. S. C. Augusto
Marco Zafalon
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset consisting of a hierarchy of 4 series all connected to the same parent, where each series is a sine wave corrupted by noise. The observations are the first period of the sine wave and the task is to predict the second cycle.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Data Set (Experiment A)

dcterms:creator: Giorgio Corani
Dario Azzimonti
João P. S. C. Augusto
Marco Zafalon
dcterms:description: A real dataset consisting of the number of tourists who entered Australia on a monthly basis, categorized by their reason for entrance (Holiday, Visitor, Business, Other) from 1998 to 2016. The data is aggregated into 27 macro zones and then into 7 states.
dcterms:title: Real Data Set (Tourists entering Australia)
